It's an amazing game at first, and once you realize it will always be a broken, cash-grab of a game, you die more inside. Just go do some shrooms instead.

Игра хоть и однообразная но довольно атмосферная. Играя ночью в в темноте, в полностью закрытом помещении можно придать игре особый ужасающий. По мимо страха в игре можно и забавно провести время, играя с друзьями. Так же можно отметить разнообразие как положительных так и отрицательных персонажей и способов их "модификации". Очень хорошая игра чтобы скоротать время и немного пощекотать нервишки.

Я xyu клал на эту игру и её разработчиков, а знаете почему? да потому что разрабам абсолютно похуй на их продукт, им главное добавить больше дизбалансных манов и по больше донатной косметики на персонажей, axyeHHo 6JI9Tb, игра до краев наполнена nudopacamu которые любят-покемперить вас у крюка, преследовать сначала именно одного игрока до его смерти, пикать дизбалансных манов такие как охотница, майкл майер, кожаное лицо, деревенщина, легион, крик, и т.д, можно тупо весь пул маньяков перечислить. У меня возникает такой вопрос, а разработчики вообще слушают мнение игроков? и вообще они заходили в игру последние несколько лет?, пока не появиться пати из 5 выживших, или вместо 5 генераторов станет 4, ну или пока не добавят нормальные перки выжившим чтобы шансы были более менее равны в неё не возможно играть, потому что в данный момент если вам попадется более менее скиллованый ман-то вам nu3da, в эту игру абсолютно невозможно играть без накаливания своей 5 точки во время игры, у неё есть один единственный плюс-то что с друзьями в неё весело играть, но веселье не долго будет длиться. Не советую.

The game is not good at all I will start to list the problems of the game

1) The killer is very strong and fast and has capabilities like moving from place to place and other strong capabilities. As for the survivors, they have nothing but to repair the engines and treat themselves.

2) Some powerful characters can only be unlocked with money so the game is bad and I would not recommend anyone to buy it.

3) Some maps are narrow, which makes it easy for the killer to catch you and kill you, and do not forget that the killer is much faster than you and this is a negative point.

4) There is no justice in this game because whoever pays the price for stronger characters becomes stronger, while the free characters are very weak.

5) I advise everyone not to buy it because it is not worth even half a dollar.

is funny

This game is designed to suck people's time, using persuasive technology like:
- daily quests,
- daily XP boost,
- regular increased XP events,
- an infinite account leveling system,
- a repeatable per-character leveling system,
- the need to grind massively to unlock important perks and add-ons (with luck-based perk unlocking), as well as characters and skins.
- punishment for leaving (the game forces you to fully play unfun matches - and also punishes you for its own faults: when it gives you a BSoD, you get the disconnection ban as well)

"Persuasive technology (also called persuasive design) works by deliberately creating digital environments that users feel fulfill their basic human drives — to be social or obtain goals — better than real-world alternatives. Kids spend countless hours in social media and video game environments in pursuit of likes, “friends,” game points, and levels — because it’s stimulating, they believe that this makes them happy and successful, and they find it easier than doing the difficult but developmentally important activities of childhood."

https://medium.com/@richardnfreed/the-tech-industrys-psychological-war-on-kids-c452870464ce
For those who prefer videos: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=xNjI03CGkb4

fun

Убийцам плохо! Сурвы могут просто использовать фонарики, блокировать походы и просто токсичить и убийцы не могут сделать им ничего в ответ. И после этого убийцы еще и получают нёрфы?! Разрабы одумайтесь манов нужно спасть! А то все кто играет на убийцах тупо удалят игру и напишут почти тоже что и я. Бывают такие индивиды которые после матча пишут что-то в типо "gg или EZ". Здесь всё завязано на рандоме и пиздеце. Иногда тебе везёт, и  мимо сраки промахиваются, а иногда, тебе в неё засовывают настолько глубоко, что думаешь сейчас через рот вылезет. Если ты убил всех, то "Жди бана, лох, чмо, Гитлер сука!", а если ты никого не убил то "ХА ЛОХ КАК НУБА НА ИЗИ ВЫНЕС!!!!!", но среди этого пиздеца встречаются нормальные люди. В общем мой вердикт таков : ЁБАННЫЙ РОТ ЭТОГО КАЗИНО, БЛЯДЬ!

Il gioco è molto bello, soprattutto per chi ama i giochi horror come me, contiene molti dlc che includono nuovi personaggi. Tuttavia questo capolavoro contiene ha anche dei difetti: è un po' sbilanciato(alcuni killer sono troppo più deboli rispetto ad altri, i survivors sono molto avvantaggiati ma contro un killer in particolare non possono fare niente) e contiene molti bugs.
In qualunque caso è un gioco in cui vale la pena spendere soldi, lo consiglio a tutti gli amanti dell'horror

System has been overhauled so it's not the grind fest and mess it used to be.
Characters need to be leveled to 15 to get full use out of them, which isn't any issue in early game play because matchmaking will do it's job and place you with other low rank players. However once you rank up more, starting a new character can feel like a bit of a chore if done wrong because matchmaking goes off of rank and not individual character level. I recommend earning the points you need on your higher level character and then spending those points on the low level ones. Once you get into the higher ranks, match making can feel a little "off" very high ranked survivors will end up against medium and sometimes low rank killers - Not a great experience for anyone involved.
The idea of what "winning" is in this game takes a little time to wrap your head around.
Sometimes you can kill everyone in 5 minutes and that's honestly bad
Sometimes you can escape in 5 minutes and that's honestly bad
The best way I can describe it is that the best games play like a good horror movie.
Lots of running, close escapes, tests of friendship, sacrifice and blood.
Any match missing at least average amounts of those elements will feel lacking.

There is a lot to learn to this game. Many killers and many survivors. Each with their own unique perks that you can eventually teach to other killers and survivors as well. The meta is pretty set - there are great perks and there are bad ones - but there is no end to the combination of unique characters you can build.

The game does get frequent and good content updates, new maps and characters. They are available through purchasable DLC or by unlocking with the in game currency.
It's not exactly a quick process - but it's not a terrible grind either.
Technically all characters can be obtained for free, but with over 40 unlockable characters you'd need several hundred hours to get them all.
The time to find a match isn't very long as a survivor but for a killer I've waited close to ten minutes before. Once I worked my way up to purple and red ranked killer, I no longer had the issue with long ques. 

Overall the game is fun for me to play and I keep coming back after almost 100 hours.
